Text: Thanks bro.....but can u upload Encylopedia of human body.......
Thanks, I remember this one, may still have it somewhere. :)
Do you have any idea how much our understanding of the Human Body has changed in 50 years?  This is quaint but it is very outdated.

@mentikor777:
That is the first thought that occurred to me too, but I didn't dare say it, because this guy gnv65 is highly respected here for contributing wonderfull stuff consistently and I also have respect for him.

You are quite right mentikor777!
But the basic anatomy has not changed, the organs/bones are the same - hence this book is good enough for the beginners/schoolchildren for whom its meant. 
Its definitely not for advanced users!
